# BioNetworks

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of BioNetworks is to analyze biological networks using graph theory concepts
![](man/figures/README-Network.png)

## Installation

You can install the development version of BioNetworks by: (new)

``` r
library(devtools)
devtools::install_github("yzohdy/BioNetworks")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to anaylze a set of differentially expressed genes (DEGs) or proteins:

```{r example,message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(BioNetworks)
## basic example code
```
